## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G21200](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G21200)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATGA2OX8, GA2OX8</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA GIBBERELLIN 2-OXIDASE 8, gibberellin 2-oxidase 8
- **Description:**   gibberellin 2-oxidase 8;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
